items.creator: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.title: Where to Turn When You're Frustrated | God Is: Part 5
items.content:
Sometimes it can feel like the only constant around us is change. But the Bible tells us God never changes. What does that mean for us, and why does it matter? We’re talking about it in this message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

When you see God Is _____ what comes to mind? How can any of us really know what God's like? Too often, we view Him from our limited perspective, but it doesn't have to be that way. Together, let's discover how to fill that space with truth. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: The Message You Don't Want To Hear | God Is: Part 4
items.content:
Did you know that holiness is mentioned 637 times in the Bible? It’s an attribute of God that many people don’t want to hear about, but it’s one we need the most. What’s so important about God’s holiness? We’ll find out in this message.  

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

items.title: When You Feel Like God Can’t Love You | God Is: Part 3
items.content:
Have you ever asked yourself, "Why does God love me?" The truth is, God loves you infinitely. But knowing it and believing it are two different things. If you’ve ever questioned God’s love, you won’t want to miss this message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

When you see God Is _____ what comes to mind? How can any of us really know what God's like? Too often, we view Him from our limited perspective, but it doesn't have to be that way. Together, let's discover how to fill that space with truth. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

items.title: Hope When You're Hurting | God Is: Part 1
items.content:
Sometimes it can feel like the weight of the world is on your shoulders. From everything going on in the world to personal struggles, it’s easy to feel overwhelmed. No matter what you’re facing, church is a safe place to bring your doubts and fears. In this message, Pastor Craig is sharing how to find hope when you’re hurting. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

When you see God Is _____ what comes to mind? How can any of us really know what God's like? Too often, we view Him from our limited perspective, but it doesn't have to be that way. Together, let's discover how to fill that space with truth. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: When You Want to Give Up | Pre-Decide: Part 7
items.content:
Is there something you’ve been tempted to give up on? What would happen if you refuse to quit? God has a special word of encouragement for you in this message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

What if becoming the person you want to be starts long before the moment you make a decision? Before you click "buy," before you take one more bite, or before you lash out at the people you love. Can the decisions you make today help you live the life you really want tomorrow? Let's learn together in our new message series, Pre-Decide. 

We’ve hand-picked articles, podcasts, and Bible Plans to help you learn how to make better choices in your life. Check out our Pre-Decide resources page to learn more! 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

items.title: How to Be Fully Present
items.content:
Have you ever heard the saying, “Your best days are ahead of you”? What if your best days are now? Instead of constantly looking forward, we’re learning how to be present and experience what God has for us today.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Sometimes it feels like nothing is working. We can do all the right things and check all the boxes, but life seems to stay the same. How can we find the life we're longing for? Together, let’s discover A Better Way.

Learn more about A Better Way: https://www.life.church/abetterway

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

items.title: When You Stop Holding Back | Pre-Decide: Part 5
items.content:
Do you ever feel like you'd be happier if you could make a little more money, buy that car, or land that job? The Bible tells us it's more blessed to give than to receive. (Acts 20:35) But how is that possible? And how do you stop holding yourself back from being generous? We'll find out in this message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

What if becoming the person you want to be starts long before the moment you make a decision? Before you click "buy," before you take one more bite, or before you lash out at the people you love. Can the decisions you make today help you live the life you really want tomorrow? Let's learn together in our new message series, Pre-Decide. 

We’ve hand-picked articles, podcasts, and Bible Plans to help you learn how to make better choices in your life. Check out our Pre-Decide resources page to learn more! 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. items.content:encodedSnippet:
Do you want to start getting closer to God? This message is the perfect place to start! We’re learning how to become fully devoted to God’s plan for our lives. 
ABOUT THIS MESSAGE
What if becoming the person you want to be starts long before the moment you make a decision? Before you click "buy," before you take one more bite, or before you lash out at the people you love. Can the decisions you make today help you live the life you really want tomorrow? Let's learn together in our new message series, Pre-Decide. 
We’ve hand-picked articles, podcasts, and Bible Plans to help you learn how to make better choices in your life. Check out our Pre-Decide resources page to learn more! 
WE’RE OPEN
We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

items.title: 3 Keys to Overcoming Temptation
items.content:
Have you ever given in to temptation and then regretted it? Most of us have. The Bible says God won't allow us to be tempted beyond what we can bear (1 Corinthians 10:13 NIV). We’re learning three keys to overcoming temptation in this message. Don’t miss it! 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.title: Bonus! Pastor Joakim Lundqvist on the Power of Intergenerational Relationships
items.content:
Whether you’re a Gen Zer, Boomer, Millennial, or Gen Xer, this bonus episode with Pastor Joakim Lundqvist is for you. Starting off with a game of generational slang and ending with a look back to mentoring relationships throughout Scripture, we’re discovering why having relationships with people older and younger than you just might be the most valuable thing you can do. 

This episode is from You’ve Heard It Said, Life.Church’s spiritual growth podcast for LifeGroups. To find this episode and plenty more like it, you can subscribe on your favorite podcast platform, or get emails when new episodes release at www.life.church/yhis 

More About You’ve Heard It Said

Want more meaningful conversations? We started this story-driven podcast to help LifeGroups and friends reclaim their time together. Listen before meeting, then use your time to do what matters most—talking about the episode, praying, and making memories together. 

Join us as we have honest discussions about the things that matter to you, the struggles you’re facing, and the spiritual truths that can guide you to a deeper understanding of who God made you to be. 

And don’t just listen—our hope is that every episode inspires you to start a conversation with someone you care about. Check out the Show Notes to find a special Conversation Guide with questions, resources, and more to help you get started. Also, every season comes with a Bible Plan you can go through with your LifeGroup or friends using the Plans With Friends feature in the YouVersion App.

items.title: Empowering the Next Generation | Joakim Lundqvist
items.content:
If you’ve struggled to understand another generation, you’re not alone. But our God is the God of generations—He created us to live together in unity. What could happen if we looked past our generational differences and learned from each other?

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Tik Tok or Facebook. Mom jeans or skinny jeans. Cheugy or basic. If you’ve ever struggled to understand another generation, you’re not alone. What could happen if we looked past our differences to learn from each other?

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: Does God Love me?
items.content:
God loves you. People say it all the time, but do you ever wonder if it's true? Or maybe you wonder why He would love someone like you. The answer to these questions could change your life. Let's discover them together in this Christmas message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Have you ever had a question so hard you wouldn’t even say it out loud? Or a doubt so big you didn’t feel like you could share it—especially at church? Maybe it’s time to ask the tough questions together in our new series, Ever Wonder Why?

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: When God Feels Far Away | Ever Wonder Why: Part 6
items.content:

items.title: Why Didn’t God Answer My Prayer? | Ever Wonder Why: Part 3
items.content:
The Bible tells us that with God, all things are possible (Matthew 19:26 NIV). But if that's true, why do you have unanswered prayers? Does it mean you did something wrong? Or that God doesn't care? Let's talk about it as we continue our series, Ever Wonder Why?

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Have you ever had a question so hard you wouldn’t even say it out loud? Or a doubt so big you didn’t feel like you could share it—especially at church? Maybe it’s time to ask the tough questions together in our new series, Ever Wonder Why?

items.title: A Voice From Hell | Ever Wonder Why: Part 2
items.content:
Is hell a real place? And if it is, why would a loving God send people there? Hell is a tough topic, but it’s something Jesus talked about, which means it’s something we should pay attention to. In this message, we’re leaning into the hard questions as we continue our series, Ever Wonder Why?

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE
Have you ever had a question so hard you wouldn’t even say it out loud? Or a doubt so big you didn’t feel like you could share it—especially at church? Maybe it’s time to ask the tough questions together in our new series, Ever Wonder Why?
WE’RE OPEN
We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates
Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations
NEXT STEPS
Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next
ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH
Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: The Bible Is Alive
items.content:
It carries the greatest message in the world. It has the power to transform our thoughts and actions. And more people have access to its truth than ever before. The Bible Is Alive and it's transforming lives every day. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

items.title: Write Your Own Headlines | Craig Groeschel
items.content:
It's hard to sift through all of the information at our fingertips. How do we filter through it in a healthy way? Is it even possible to see the positive? Even in a complicated world, you can learn how to change your perspective and Write Your Own Headlines. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

It's hard to sift through all of the information at our fingertips. How do we filter through it in a healthy way? Is it even possible to see the positive? Even in a complicated world, you can learn how to change your perspective and Write Your Own Headlines.

items.title: Crazy Faith Story | Michael Todd
items.content:
Is there a part of your life that you've stopped believing could get better? Can you imagine what it would be like if you began to dream again? It’s time to believe more is possible. It’s time to write your Crazy Faith story.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Is there a part of your life that you've stopped believing could get better? Can you imagine what it would be like if you began to dream again? It’s time to believe more is possible. It’s time to unlock Crazy Faith.

WE’RE OPEN

items.title: When Forgiveness Seems Impossible | No Offense: Part 4
items.content:
Forgiving someone who wronged you can be hard—it might even seem impossible. We’re learning what can happen when we unlock the power of forgiveness.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

From the latest headline to social media comments, to the person who just cut you off in traffic—there are plenty of opportunities to be offended each day. But what if we decided to respond differently to those around us? Together, let’s learn how to live with No Offense.

Learn more about No Offense: https://www.life.church/nooffense

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

items.title: When Bitterness Takes Over | No Offense: Part 4
items.content:
Do you often focus on the difficult or painful parts of your past? You might be dealing with bitterness. How can you let go and move forward with your life? We’re talking about it in this message.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

From the latest headline to social media comments, to the person who just cut you off in traffic—there are plenty of opportunities to be offended each day. But what if we decided to respond differently to those around us? Together, let’s learn how to live with No Offense.

Learn more about No Offense: https://www.life.church/nooffense

items.title: You’re Not as Right as You Think | No Offense: Part 3

items.title: Dealing With “Those” People | No Offense: Part 2
items.content:
Description: 
Chances are, you know some of “those” people—the ones who know everything about everything. How can you stop being offended by difficult people? How do you know if you are one of them? We’ll find out in this message.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

From the latest headline to social media comments, to the person who just cut you off in traffic—there are plenty of opportunities to be offended each day. But what if we decided to respond differently to those around us? Together, let’s learn how to live with No Offense.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.title: Bonus! Pastor Amy Groeschel on Loving People We Disagree With
items.content:
In this bonus episode, you’ll get to hear a conversation with Pastor Amy Groeschel about how we can love people we disagree with, fight for unity, and develop humility. She also shares about the importance of relationships, which is the driving theme of her upcoming Sisters message. This episode is the first of two with Pastor Amy, and the second one will also feature her mentor of 22 years. That episode will be available exclusively on You’ve Heard It Said—Life.Church’s spiritual growth podcast for LifeGroups. Subscribe to the podcast on your favorite platform and get the Conversation Guides at https://www.life.church/yhis
 

You’ll also want to mark your calendars for the 2021 annual Sisters Event. Find dates and times and learn more about Sisters at https://www.life.church/sisters

 

About You’ve Heard It Said
Want more meaningful conversations? We started this story-driven podcast to help LifeGroups and friends reclaim their time together. Listen before meeting, then use your time to do what matters most—talking about the episode, praying, and making memories together. 

Join us as we have honest discussions about the things that matter to you, the struggles you’re facing, and the spiritual truths that can guide you to a deeper understanding of who God made you to be.

items.title: Stop Being Offended | No Offense: Part 1
items.content:
There are plenty of opportunities to be offended each day. But what if we decided to stop being offended and respond differently to those around us? In this message, we’ll learn how to live with No Offense.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

From the latest headline to social media comments, to the person who just cut you off in traffic—there are plenty of opportunities to be offended each day. But what if we decided to respond differently to those around us? Together, let’s learn how to live with No Offense.

Learn more about No Offense: https://www.life.church/nooffense

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: When You’ve Given Up on Prayer | A Better Way: Part 5
items.content:
Do you ever wonder if you’re praying the right way? Maybe you keep praying, but it feels like your prayers aren’t effective. In this message, we’re learning how to unlock the power of prayer. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Sometimes it feels like nothing is working. We can do all the right things and check all the boxes, but life seems to stay the same. How can we find the life we're longing for? Together, let’s discover A Better Way.

Learn more about A Better Way: https://www.life.church/abetterway

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.title: Bonus: Pastor Craig Shares About Why We Need a Better Way
items.content:
On this special, bonus episode, you’ll get to hear extended content from Pastor Craig about why we need a better way, what sparked his message series, A Better Way, and how we can have a healthier relationship with work and rest. This episode is the first in a 2-part miniseries to help you dive deeper into this series. Find the second episode, and others like it, at You’ve Heard It Said—Life.Church’s spiritual growth podcast for LifeGroups. To subscribe and get the Conversation Guide, visit https://www.life.church/yhis


About You’ve Heard It Said

Want more meaningful conversations? We started this story-driven podcast to help LifeGroups and friends reclaim their time together. Listen before meeting, then use your time to do what matters most—talking about the episode, praying, and making memories together. 

Join us as we have honest discussions about the things that matter to you, the struggles you’re facing, and the spiritual truths that can guide you to a deeper understanding of who God made you to be.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.title: When You’re Too Busy for What Matters | A Better Way: Part 2
items.content:
Do you ever feel like you’re too busy for what matters? You’re always feeling rushed and are burned out by the busyness of life. There’s A Better Way to live, and we’ll learn all about it in this message.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Sometimes it feels like nothing is working. We can do all the right things and check all the boxes, but life seems to stay the same. How can we find the life we're longing for? Together, let’s discover A Better Way.

Learn more about A Better Way: https://www.life.church/abetterway

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app. 

FIND US ON SOCIAL MEDIA

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sam Marin)
items.title: Ingredients of Great Friendships | Sam Marin
items.content:
Some things just go better together—like beans and rice. It’s the same with people. We all have a purpose, but we’re not meant to function alone. Let’s learn why biblical community and relationships are essential ingredients in our lives. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Some things just go better together. Like beans and rice. On their own, they serve a purpose. But together, they complement each other and create endless possibilities. It’s the same with people—we all have a purpose, but we’re not meant to function alone. Learn more in this new message! 

Learn more about Beans & Rice & Jesus Christ: https://www.life.church/media/beans-rice-jesus-christ/

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.title: Are Your Prayers Too Safe?
items.content:
It’s hard to hear from God when you don’t know what to listen for, especially if you find yourself praying with caution. But He’s ready for you to give Him your boldest prayers, and wants you to understand what He has to say. In this message, join Pastor Craig Groeschel to discover how to clear your mind and prepare your heart so you can be ready to hear from God.

This message was originally presented as a part of a series called Dangerous Prayers. Find out more about the series here: www.life.church/dangerousprayers

Our current series, At the Movies can only be seen at a Life.Church location or at Life.Church Online. Each week on YouTube, we’re highlighting one of your favorite messages—but you can head to https://www.life.church/atthemovies to find a location or visit https://live.life.church to attend Life.Church Online anytime. See you At the Movies!

NEXT STEPS

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Craig Groeschel)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Craig Groeschel)
items.title: Battling Anxiety
items.content:
When you’ve had enough of being anxious, you might make some mistakes. Learn from the biblical figure Elijah how to avoid running yourself into the ground, shutting people out, focusing on the negative, and forgetting God in your anxiety. God speaks in the whispers: don’t be anxious for nothing when you’ve had enough!

This message was originally presented as a part of a series called Anxious for Nothing. Find out more about the series here: https://www.life.church/anxious

Our current series, At the Movies can only be seen at a Life.Church location or at Life.Church Online. Each week on YouTube, we’re highlighting one of your favorite messages—but you can head to https://www.life.church/atthemovies to find a location or visit https://live.life.church to attend Life.Church Online anytime. See you At the Movies!

God speaks in the whispers: don’t be anxious for nothing when you’ve had enough!
This message was originally presented as a part of a series called Anxious for Nothing. Find out more about the series here: https://www.life.church/anxious
Our current series, At the Movies can only be seen at a Life.Church location or at Life.Church Online. Each week on YouTube, we’re highlighting one of your favorite messages—but you can head to https://www.life.church/atthemovies to find a location or visit https://live.life.church to attend Life.Church Online anytime. See you At the Movies!

items.title: What Your Life is Missing
items.content:
Have you ever wished you knew what to do when you feel hopeless? If you feel disconnected, hopeless, or you just know something is missing—it's not the end of your story. It's an opportunity to reconnect. To find hope. And to rediscover what you lost. Don’t miss out on this special message with Pastor Craig Groeschel.

This message was originally presented as a part of a series called What Your Life is Missing. Find out more about the series here: https://www.life.church/media/what-your-life-is-missing/

items.author: interactive@life.church (Craig Groeschel)
items.title: What Christians Get Wrong About Truth And Grace
items.content:
Grace and truth are the cornerstones of the Gospel and Christianity. But here’s some truth: Sometimes, Christians get it wrong. And here’s some grace: Falling short is okay when you know the Savior. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel to discover why Christians can get it wrong, and what we can do to embrace the grace and truth that Christ offers to us.

This message was originally presented as a part of a series called In God We Trust. FInd out more about the series here:: https://www.life.church/ingodwetrust

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

items.author: interactive@life.church (Craig Groeschel, Joakim Lundqvist)
items.title: Following Jesus in Today’s World
items.content:
Jesus calls people to follow Him, and knowing where He's headed will change everything. Let’s learn how to follow Jesus together.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

If you choose to follow someone for the rest of your life, don't you want to know where they're going? Jesus calls people to follow Him, and knowing where He's headed will change everything. In our new message, we’ll learn what Following Jesus in Today’s World really means.

Learn more about Following Jesus in Today’s World: www.life.church/media/following-jesus-in-todays-world

Start the Following Jesus in Today’s World Bible Plan: www.go2.lc/followjesus

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

items.title: 3 Principles to Help Your Relationships
items.content:
What if the relationship God wants for you looks nothing like the relationship you want for yourself? It could be time to rip up your relationship goals list and find out what God has planned for you instead.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Relationships are complicated, but do they have to be? How do you know if your one is "the one"? Can a book as old as the Bible help relationships today? We’re talking about being single, dating, marriage, and more in our new series, Modern Romance.

Learn more about Modern Romance: www.life.church/modernromance

Start the Modern Romance Bible Plan: www.go2.lc/modernromance

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

items.title: Gratitude is the Key to Happiness | Joakim Lundqvist
items.content:
You can never fully control your circumstances, but you can fully control your attitude. In Week 4 of True Virtue, we’re learning how to keep an attitude of gratitude.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

In a cynical world, it’s easy to give the impression of good character without actually living it out. But now more than ever, actions speak louder than words. Not just any action, but the kind centered on what matters most. Let’s learn how we can bring True Virtue back into our everyday lives.

Find Your Fit

items.title: When You Feel Like Giving Up
items.content:
Are you thinking about giving up on something important? Don’t quit until you hear Week 3 of True Virtue. It could be exactly what you need to keep going. 

 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

In a cynical world, it’s easy to give the impression of good character without actually living it out. But now more than ever, actions speak louder than words. Not just any action, but the kind centered on what matters most. Let’s learn how we can bring True Virtue back into our everyday lives.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Craig Groeschel)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Craig Groeschel)
items.title: A Matter of Integrity
items.content:
At Life.Church, we like to say, “If we live with integrity, nothing else matters. If we don’t live with integrity, nothing else matters.” But what does that really mean? And how do we live with integrity in all aspects of our lives? Find out in Week 2 of True Virtue. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

In a cynical world, it’s easy to give the impression of good character without actually living it out. But now more than ever, actions speak louder than words. Not just any action, but the kind centered on what matters most. Let’s learn how we can bring True Virtue back into our everyday lives.

Find Your Fit

Something inside you just might be part of God’s plans to change the world around you. Because of how much we believe this, at Life.Church there are serving opportunities to fit your schedule and your skills! Learn more at http://www.life.church/findmyfit

Learn more about True Virtue: www.life.church/truevirtue

Start the True Virtue Bible Plan: www.go2.lc/truevirtue

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: Get Over Yourself | Deep Clean Part 5
items.content:
Pride is something that most of us struggle with, but it’s not always easy to detect. During Week 5 of Deep Clean, we’re learning more about pride and humility so we can step into who God created us to be.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Sometimes life can leave us feeling like a mess. The kind of mess that’s just too complicated to figure out. But it’s possible to start fresh. To experience life in a new way. Discover how in our new message series, Deep Clean.

Start Your Deep Clean

As we talk through different topics in our current message series, Deep Clean, we want to equip you with tools specific to your personal needs. Visit http://www.life.church/howtoquit and https://www.life.church/mydeepclean to learn more.

Learn more about Deep Clean: www.life.church/deepclean

Start the Deep Clean Bible Plan: http://www.go2.lc/clean

WE’RE OPEN

To ensure safety at all of our Life.Church locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. items.title: How to Quit Porn | Deep Clean Part 2

items.title: How Much Money Do You Need to Be Happy?
items.content:
Does money buy happiness? We’ve been told all our lives that it doesn’t. But could the way we steward our finances bring us a joy that will last a lifetime? We think so! Learn more in Week 3 of our series, Keep the Change.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

When life’s circumstances force you to rethink your finances, where do you turn for answers? No matter where you are on your financial journey, it’s possible to honor God with your money. Together, let’s learn what the Bible says about finances and gain some practical tools that will give us the freedom to say, “Keep the Change!” 

Learn more about Keep the Change: life.church/keepthechange

Start the Keep the Change Bible Plan: www.go2.lc/change

Sometimes the reason we struggle with our finances is because we’ve been told lies about money that give us a false perspective. This week, we’re learning what the Bible says so we can apply God's truth to our finances.
ABOUT THIS MESSAGE
When life’s circumstances force you to rethink your finances, where do you turn for answers? No matter where you are on your financial journey, it’s possible to honor God with your money. Together, let’s learn what the Bible says about finances and gain some practical tools that will give us the freedom to say, “Keep the Change!” 
Learn more about Keep the Change: life.church/keepthechange
Start the Keep the Change Bible Plan: www.go2.lc/change
WE’RE OPEN
To ensure safety at all of our Life.Church locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates
Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations
NEXT STEPS
Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next
ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH
Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: Calm My Anxious Mind
items.content:
Our thoughts are powerful. They change our perspective, impact our decisions, and influence our habits. But what do we do when we become trapped by our thoughts, unable to escape negative and unhealthy thinking? Let’s learn what it means to take our thoughts captive and win the war in our minds.

Learn more about Winning the War in Your Mind: https://www.life.church/media/winning-the-war-in-your-mind/

Start the Winning the War in Your Mind Bible Plan: www.go2.lc/war

WE’RE OPEN

To ensure safety at all of our Life.Church locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. Sometimes no matter what we do, we make the wrong decision. It’s as though we have the wires crossed in our minds. items.title: Winning the War in Your Mind
items.content:
We’ve all tried to think our way out of bad habits and unhealthy thought patterns, only to find ourselves stuck with an out-of-control mind and off-track daily life. But God has something better for your life than your old ways of thinking. It’s time to decide to change your thinking so God can change your life. 

Learn more about Winning the War in Your Mind: https://www.life.church/media/winning-the-war-in-your-mind/

items.title: Bonus! Pastor Craig Opens Up About How He Wins the War in His Mind
items.content:
In this special episode, we get to sit down with Pastor Craig and talk about his new book and upcoming message series. In fact, this episode is the first part in the Winning the War in Your Mind miniseries from Pastor Craig, where we’ll discover how to change our thinking so that we can change our lives. The rest of the miniseries will be available exclusively on the You’ve Heard It Said podcast—Life.Church’s spiritual growth podcast for LifeGroups. Go to http://life.church/YHIS to subscribe on your favorite podcast platform.

ABOUT YOU'VE HEARD IT SAID

Want more meaningful conversations? We started this story-driven podcast to help LifeGroups and friends reclaim their time together. Listen before meeting, then do the important stuff together—talking about the episodes, praying, and making memories.

Join us for honest discussions about the things that matter to you, the struggles you’re facing, and the spiritual truths that can guide you to a deeper understanding of who God made you to be. 
Go to http://life.church/YHIS to subscribe on your favorite podcast platform.

WE’RE OPEN

To ensure safety at all of our Life.Church locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

The rest of the miniseries will be available exclusively on the You’ve Heard It Said podcast—Life.Church’s spiritual growth podcast for LifeGroups. 
Go to http://life.church/YHIS to subscribe on your favorite podcast platform.

items.title: How To Forgive Yourself
items.content:
Forgiving others is hard, but self-forgiveness can be even harder. God wants you to step out of the shame that holds you back and into the freedom He has for you. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel to see what can change when you choose to forgive yourself.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

This week, we’re taking a look back at a message we think is just as impactful today as it was nearly two years ago. Check out the video for more!

Learn more about The Grudge: https://www.life.church/greaterreward

Start The Grudge Bible Plan: www.go2.lc/grudge

items.title: Don’t Give Up - Greater Reward Part 3
items.content:
Now more than ever, we need a fresh start.

You could do what you’ve always done. Choose what you want now over what you want most. But there’s a Greater Reward waiting for you. Discover how to let go of the status quo and stay focused on who God says you are and what He wants for your life.

Learn more about Greater Reward: https://www.life.church/greaterreward

Start the Greater Reward Bible Plan: www.go2.lc/reward

itunes.summary: Do you ever look at someone successful and wonder how they did it? Often, we’re tempted to think they just got lucky. But it’s not luck that determines the direction of our lives. It's the result of countless consistent, seemingly small decisions done over time. Don’t give up if it’s taking you longer than you thought to reach your goals. Join us for Week 3 of our message series, Greater Reward, to learn how to make decisions today that will give you the life God wants you to have.

itunes.summary: Do you ever wonder why you are trying to change, but can’t seem to make any real differences in your life? Whether it’s your marriage, faith, health, or something else entirely, maybe you haven’t been able to change because you’ve been trying too hard. Maybe it’s time to start training. Join us for week 2 of our message series, Greater Reward, to learn how to stop trying and start training.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.title: Help! I’m Out of Control - Greater Reward Part 1
items.content:
Society often tells us that if we want something, we should be able to have it RIGHT NOW. But that’s not the way life usually works. Often, when we want something, we have to create and maintain the discipline to reach our goals. In week one of Greater Reward, we’ll learn how to build self-discipline to choose what we want most instead of what we want now.

ABOUT GREATER REWARD

Now more than ever, we need a fresh start.

You could do what you’ve always done. Choose what you want now over what you want most. But there’s a Greater Reward waiting for you. Discover how to let go of the status quo and stay focused on who God says you are and what He wants for your life.

Learn more about Greater Reward: https://www.life.church/greaterreward

Start the Greater Reward Bible Plan: www.go2.lc/reward

To ensure safety at all of our Life.Church locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. items.author: interactive@life.church (Craig Groeschel)
items.title: 3 Promises for 2021
items.content:
25 years ago, Pastor Craig Groeschel and his wife Amy launched Life.Church in a two-car garage in Edmond, Oklahoma. In the last two and a half decades, we’ve seen God do more than we could ask, think, or imagine through you—the people of this church. This entire weekend will be a celebration of all God has done through Life.Church in the past 25 years - and what He promises to do in the years to come.

WE’RE OPEN

To ensure safety at all of our Life.Church locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Joakim Lundqvist)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Joakim Lundqvist)
items.title: God's Dream in Your Heart
items.content:
God has big plans for you. He plants big dreams in your heart—and they can bloom when the soil is fertile. Set your sights on what’s ahead and prepare your soul to chase new hopes and goals as we enter this year together. Join Pastor Joakim Lundqvist for a special message as we kick off 2021 focused on God’s big dreams for our lives.

WELCOME PASTOR JOAKIM LUNDQVIST

Pastor Joakim Lundqvist is Senior Pastor of Word of Life Church in Uppsala, Sweden, with 3,200 members and an international network including over 700 churches. Before stepping into the ministry of Senior Pastor at Word of Life, Pastor Joakim founded the Christian cross-denominational student organization New Generation in Sweden. His 30 years of experience in youth ministry shines through in his creative sermons, aiming to relate to every generation. 

He is married to Maria, who serves as Music Director at Word of Life, and they have two daughters, Evelina and Julia, who are also both involved in the church and ministry.

 

CONNECT WITH PASTOR JOAKIM

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/joakiml  

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/joakim.lundqvist  

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/joakimlundqvist

WE’RE OPEN

To ensure safety at all of our Life.Church locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

His 30 years of experience in youth ministry shines through in his creative sermons, aiming to relate to every generation. 
He is married to Maria, who serves as Music Director at Word of Life, and they have two daughters, Evelina and Julia, who are also both involved in the church and ministry.

items.content:encoded:
God has big plans for you. He plants big dreams in your heart—and they can bloom when the soil is fertile. Set your sights on what’s ahead and prepare your soul to chase new hopes and goals as we enter this year together. Join Pastor Joakim Lundqvist for a special message as we kick off 2021 focused on God’s big dreams for our lives.

WELCOME PASTOR JOAKIM LUNDQVIST

Pastor Joakim Lundqvist is Senior Pastor of Word of Life Church in Uppsala, Sweden, with 3,200 members and an international network including over 700 churches. Before stepping into the ministry of Senior Pastor at Word of Life, Pastor Joakim founded the Christian cross-denominational student organization New Generation in Sweden. His 30 years of experience in youth ministry shines through in his creative sermons, aiming to relate to every generation. 

He is married to Maria, who serves as Music Director at Word of Life, and they have two daughters, Evelina and Julia, who are also both involved in the church and ministry.

itunes.summary: When you’re pursuing your passion, there are three “P”s that matter most: your people, the problem, and your gift. (OK, so two “P”s and one “G.”) In between rapid-fire jokes and real-life stories, comedian Michael Jr. will explain how to find your life’s punchline and how to leave a legacy that makes a difference. We hope you’re ready to laugh.

items.title: When You’re Disappointed by God - Missing Peace Part 4
items.content:
ABOUT MISSING PEACE

Moments of peace are precious. When we find them, we hold on tight and pray they last. But there's a peace that goes beyond our understanding—beyond the pain and fear we face today. If you've been Missing Peace, come discover it with us. 

Learn more about Missing Peace: https://www.life.church/missingpeace

Start the Missing Peace Bible Plan: https://www.go2.lc/missingpeace

itunes.summary: Have you ever felt angry at God? Like His plans don’t match yours—or like He doesn’t even have a plan for you at all? Sometimes God interrupts our plans for His purpose. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel for this special Christmas message and see how our disappointments might actually be divine appointments from God.

itunes.summary: Have you ever felt like you’re waiting on God? His timing might always be perfect, but from where we sit, it can also be frustrating. It can even feel like sometimes, He’s forgotten us. In this message, Pastor Craig Groeschel will take a look at what happens when God’s timing makes us pause, reflect, and depend on Him.

items.title: Help! These People Are Driving Me Crazy - Missing Peace Part 2
items.content:
Have you ever wished there was a manual for how to deal with difficult people? Jesus didn’t call us to be right, He called us to be loving. He called us to forgive. So while it’s easy to be offended by what we see in the world, we’re called to forgive. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel for a lesson in how to deal with difficult people in this message.

items.title: Does What I Do Matter?
items.content:
Pause for just a moment. In a season filled with bad news, God's still at work. He’s still shaping lives, working miracles, and showing His love—and He’s chosen to do it all through you. Because of You, we’ve got reason to celebrate.

Pause for just a moment. In a season filled with bad news, God's still at work. He’s still shaping lives, working miracles, and showing His love—and He’s chosen to do it all through you. Because of You, we’ve got reason to celebrate.

More: https://www.life.church/becauseofyou

items.title: Has 2020 Knocked You Down?
items.content:
Alongside her husband Craig, Amy Groeschel co-founded Life.Church in 1996. As the leader of Sisters, the Life.Church women’s ministry, she authors Bible studies for women, including The Call, The Pursuit, and The Hope. She is also the founder and President of Branch15, a non-profit housing ministry supporting women on the path to recovery. Amy and Craig married in 1991 and have six children.

Connect with Pastor Amy on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/amygroeschel

Start the Rise Up and Stand Firm Bible Plan: https://www.go2.lc/riseup

itunes.summary: Sometimes, it’s hard to have faith, because the reality is this: life is unpredictable. But you were made to persevere, no matter the highs and lows. Join Pastor Amy Groeschel for this week’s message of hope and faith, and find out how to stand firm and rejoice through pain and uncertainty.

items.title: When Christians Get It Wrong: In God We Trust Part 4
items.content:
ABOUT IN GOD WE TRUST

Pandemics. Politics. Social unrest. There’s no denying we’re in a season of conflict and chaos—but the noise in your news feed doesn’t have to pollute your soul. You can find peace. You can find hope. You can trust in the One who holds the future in His hands. Learn more about In God We Trust: https://www.life.church/ingodwetrust

Start the In God We Trust Bible Plan: https://www.go2.lc/trust

itunes.summary: Grace and truth are the cornerstones of the Gospel and Christianity. But here’s some truth: Sometimes, Christians get it wrong. And here’s some grace: Falling short is okay when you know the Savior. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel to discover why Christians can get it wrong, and what we can do to embrace the grace and truth that Christ offers to us.

itunes.summary: Need some good news? In times of trouble God overflows with His exceedingly abundant protection, provision, and strength. Our God is big enough to oversee the whole world and loving enough to care about you. Be still and know that He is God. Take heart in this message of good news from Pastor Craig Groeschel.

items.title: Under the Influence: In God We Trust Part 2
items.content:
ABOUT IN GOD WE TRUST

Pandemics. Politics. Social unrest. There’s no denying we’re in a season of conflict and chaos—but the noise in your news feed doesn’t have to pollute your soul. You can find peace. You can find hope. You can trust in the One who holds the future in His hands. Learn more about In God We Trust: https://www.life.church/ingodwetrust

Start the In God We Trust Bible Plan: https://www.go2.lc/trust

WE’RE OPEN

To ensure safety at all of our Life.Church locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

itunes.summary: Are you under the influence of God or culture? When we lower our guard, it’s hard to know what’s influencing us—but whatever we allow to influence us, changes us. In this message, Pastor Craig Groeschel uses the biblical story of Daniel to illustrate how to stay under God’s influence when the world offers tempting alternatives to His righteousness.
itunes.author: Craig Groeschel

items.title: Can You Trust God? In God We Trust Part 1
items.content:
It’s hard to trust God when you don’t understand the plan, and even harder to surrender when you’re longing for control. But in the midst of the chaos, there’s a hope you can cling to. In this message, Pastor Craig Groeschel shares two prayers you can pray that will help you build your obedience to trust God and to surrender to Him what you cannot control.

items.title: Make Miracles Happen - 21st Century Temples: Part 2
items.content:
WELCOME PASTOR JOAKIM LUNDQVIST

Pastor Joakim Lundqvist is Senior Pastor of Word of Life Church in Uppsala, Sweden, with 3,200 members and an international network including over 700 churches. Before stepping into the ministry of Senior Pastor at Word of Life, Pastor Joakim founded the Christian cross-denominational student organization New Generation in Sweden. His 30 years of experience in youth ministry shines through in his creative sermons, aiming to relate to every generation. 

He is married to Maria, who serves as Music Director at Word of Life, and they have two daughters, Evelina and Julia, who are also both involved in the church and ministry.

 

CONNECT WITH PASTOR JOAKIM

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/joakiml  

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/joakim.lundqvist  

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/joakimlundqvist  

ABOUT 21st CENTURY TEMPLES

Miracles beyond belief, truth pushing back fear and lies, answered prayers: They don’t just belong in stories from the past. They’re happening today—and they can happen through you, too. Learn more about this series: https://www.life.church/temples

LIFE.CHURCH LOCATIONS ARE OPEN

To ensure safety at all of our Life.Church locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more:: https://www.life.church/updates

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

items.title: Are You an Invisible Christian? 21st Century Temples: Part 1
items.content:
WELCOME PASTOR JOAKIM LUNDQVIST

Pastor Joakim Lundqvist is Senior Pastor of Word of Life Church in Uppsala, Sweden, with 3,200 members and an international network including over 700 churches. Before stepping into the ministry of Senior Pastor at Word of Life, Pastor Joakim founded the Christian cross-denominational student organization New Generation in Sweden. His 30 years of experience in youth ministry shines through in his creative sermons, aiming to relate to every generation. 

He is married to Maria, who serves as Music Director at Word of Life, and they have two daughters, Evelina and Julia, who are also both involved in the church and ministry.

 

CONNECT WITH PASTOR JOAKIM

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/joakiml

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/joakimlundqvist

itunes.summary: Take a fresh look at our favorite message series from the last few years at Life.Church with The Best Of! In this message from the Anxious for Nothing series, learn from the biblical figure Elijah how to avoid running yourself into the ground, shutting people out, focusing on the negative, and forgetting God in your anxiety. God speaks in the whispers: don’t be anxious for nothing when you’ve had enough!

items.title: Emotions, Part 4: Feeling Lost in Sadness? Experience Joy Again
items.content:
ABOUT EMOTIONS

Joy. Sadness. Anger. Compassion. Emotions are electric. God has given each of us the capacity to feel deeply. And when we can better process our powerful emotions, we can start to understand how He will use them for His good. Learn more about the Emotions message series: https://www.life.church/emotions  

REOPENING

itunes.summary: Jesus felt sadness—and he feels the sadness so many of us are feeling in the world right now. There’s one thing that brings Jesus sadness more than anything else, and it’s the same thing that keeps us from experiencing His joy. In this message, you’ll hear three ways you can experience joy with Jesus, and why it’s so much better being joyful together than feeling sadness alone.
itunes.keywords: emotions, overcome sadness, emotion, feeling sad, sad for no reason, joy, sadness, sad, feelings, why am i sad for no reason, experience true joy, joyful, emotional, feeling sad for no reason, how to deal with sadness
itunes.author: Craig Groeschel

itunes.summary: Jesus felt many emotions—and anger was one of them. But there are a few things we can learn about why Jesus got angry, and what He chose to do when He felt strong emotions. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel for a message about how when we focus our anger on the right things and channel our emotions the right way, we can start to unite a divided world.

itunes.summary: Jesus Himself needed anxiety relief. And when He despaired, He gave us the blueprint for how to deal with worry, stress, and fear. If you need anxiety relief, join Pastor Craig Groeschel and discover the three things Jesus leads us to do to find peace in our hearts and align the feelings we experience with a faith that never fails.

itunes.summary: When you’re grieving, when you’ve got hurt feelings, when you’re struggling, remember—Jesus hurt the same way you do. And He feels compassion for people who hurt. In this message, Pastor Craig Groeschel speaks to anyone feeling unsettled, depressed, anxious, or hopeless with a simple reminder: God sees you. Cast your hopes, your cares, and your hurt feelings on Him. He cares for you.
itunes.keywords: grief, hurt, hurt feelings, emotions, how are you, grieving, emotion, feeling, feelings, how are you doing, pain, struggle, compassion
itunes.author: Craig Groeschel

items.title: Don't Forget to Remember, Part 2: "Get Out"
items.content:
ABOUT PASTOR ROBERT MADU

Robert is passionately in love with Jesus. For 10 years he has crisscrossed the globe, preaching the Gospel and taking every opportunity to tell people about the love of Jesus Christ. Robert is compelled to make aware to every individual that God is for them and that He has a specific plan and purpose for every life. Robert serves on the teaching team at Trinity Church in Cedar Hill, TX. He and his wife Taylor have three children.

CONNECT WITH PASTOR ROBERT

Web: https://robertmadu.com/

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/robertmadu

ABOUT DON’T FORGET TO REMEMBER

Uncertainty can drive you to fear, worry, and doubt. But it’s also an invitation to hope. When you’re faced with something you can’t handle on your own, Don’t Forget to Remember who worked miracles in the past—and that He can do it again. Learn more about the Don’t Forget to Remember message series: https://www.life.church/dontforget

itunes.summary: Sometimes interruptions are invitations to take a leap of faith. If you’ve been hit with something you can’t handle, then it’s a job for Jesus! Join Pastor Robert Madu for an incredible message on miracles, how desperation opens doors to take a leap of faith, and how God’s authority connects to your faith.

itunes.summary: If you’re feeling overwhelmed, you’re not alone. Jesus worked many miracles in the Bible—and yet his disciples still sometimes doubted Him. Don’t forget to remember His power when you’re feeling overwhelmed! If you’re ready to stop worrying and start relying on God’s power in your own life, join Pastor Robert Madu for a message on compassion, action, and how to remember that God is always in control.

items.title: Called, Part 2: Reclaim Your Calling
items.content:
ABOUT CALLED

Your life has meaning. Maybe you haven’t discovered your passion yet. Maybe you knew your calling once, but it’s gone now. Or maybe, you just need a reminder of what your purpose truly is. There’s no denying it: You’re Called. The only question is, are you ready to answer? Learn more about the Called message series: https://www.life.church/called

REOPENING

itunes.summary: Wondering how to find your purpose? It's not always easy, and when you find it, it will probably be even tougher to live it out. The moment you step into your calling, you step out of your comfort zone. But when you're called to a purpose, backing down isn't an option. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel to discover how reclaiming your calling may come at a cost—but it will also sustain you in the long run.

The moment you step into your calling, you step out of your comfort zone. But when you're called to a purpose, backing down isn't an option. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel to discover how reclaiming your calling may come at a cost—but it will also sustain you in the long run.

itunes.summary: When you think about your calling, you might think about what you’re called by God to do. But your purpose isn’t as much about what you’re doing as it is who you’re becoming. Being called by God means you’re set apart—but what is it that you’re set apart for? Join Pastor Craig Groeschel on a journey to find your purpose and understand who you God made you to be.

items.content:
REOPENING

To ensure safety at all of our Life.Church locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more:: https://www.life.church/updates

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

WELCOME PASTOR JOAKIM LUNDQVIST

Pastor Joakim Lundqvist is Senior Pastor of Word of Life Church in Uppsala, Sweden, with 3,200 members and an international network including over 700 churches. Before stepping into the ministry of Senior Pastor at Word of Life, Pastor Joakim founded the Christian cross-denominational student organization New Generation in Sweden. His 30 years of experience in youth ministry shines through in his creative sermons, aiming to relate to every generation. 

He is married to Maria, who serves as Music Director at Word of Life, and they have two daughters, Evelina and Julia, who are also both involved in the church and ministry.

itunes.summary: The power of the Holy Spirit is strong. Don’t let thunderstorms and crashing waves around you keep you from what God has in store for you. Every day, you’re given chances to grow, to connect, and to make a difference. Are you ready to Step Out of Your Boat into something greater? Join Pastor Joakim Lundqvist to see how the Holy Spirit isn’t just preparing you for something incredible—the power of the Holy Spirit is preparing others for it, too.

items.title: Stay Positive, Part 6: Ending the Scarcity Cycle
items.content:
REOPENING

To ensure safety at all of our Life.Church locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more:: https://www.life.church/updates

I’M GENEROUS

When you gave your life to God, you accepted the most generous gift of all. This four-day Bible Plan will help you discover the only rational response. Start reading the next Stay Positive Bible Plan, “I’m Generous”: https://www.go2.lc/staypositive

SUPPORT COVID-19 RESPONSE AND DIGITAL MISSIONS

You can designate a gift to Life.Church to go to coronavirus relief or to Digital Missions like the Church Online Platform! Your gift above the tithe helps meet immediate needs in your community and around the world and helps other churches to spread the Good News of Christ to people everywhere: https://www.life.church/giving

ABOUT STAY POSITIVE

There’s no limit on hope. You can discover a whole lot to smile about if you know where to look. And we can help you find it! Don’t let life get you down. Stay joyful. Stay hopeful. And Stay Positive! For more about this series, visit https://www.life.church/staypositive

STAY CONNECTED

Stay updated with the latest news from Life.Church at https://www.life.church/stayconnected. You can also visit https://www.life.church/updates for the latest, or download the Life.Church app (https://www.life.church/app) and enable push notifications.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

itunes.summary: How do we inoculate ourselves against the scarcity mindset? How do we decide to live with the abundance mindset that reminds us God is more than enough? In this message, find out how to stop the scarcity cycle using three principles of provision and stay positive through faith in God.

itunes.summary: Spiritual enthusiasm is contagious. If you’ve lost your passion, it’s time to get it back! Remember, it’s not what you do that makes it meaningful, it’s who you do it for. If you need a daily reminder of the passion you once had, join Pastor Craig Groeschel for Week 5 of Stay Positive!

items.title: God, Help Us Unite: Stop the Division
items.content:
ABOUT GOD, HELP US UNITE

When our world is divided and people are hurting, what’s our responsibility as followers of Christ? Where do we even start? Get next steps and follow-up resources for this series at https://go2.lc/stopracism

WANT TO KNOW WHAT THE BIBLE SAYS ABOUT RACIAL RECONCILIATION?

Check out these YouVersion Bible Plans:

-Tony Evans Explores Racial Reconciliation: https://www.bible.com/reading-plans/20082-tony-evans-explores-racial-reconciliation

-Rev. Dr. Bernice A. King: Cultivating a Heart of Mercy: https://www.bible.com/reading-plans/13890-bernice-king-cultivating-a-heart-of-mercy/

-Be The Bridge: By Latasha Morrison: https://www.bible.com/reading-plans/16910-the-bridge-a-5-day-youversion-by-latasha-morrison/

-Patterns for Peace: https://www.bible.com/reading-plans/17861-patterns-for-peace

MORE ON RACIAL RECONCILIATION:

-We Can Do Better to Stop Racism: https://finds.life.church/stop-racism/

-Racism is Real: https://finds.life.church/racism-real-martin-luther-king-jr-grandma/

-How I Learned to Live a Life That Matters from a Civil Rights Pioneer: https://finds.life.church/learned-live-life-matters-civil-rights-pioneer/

-Racism and the Heart of God: https://finds.life.church/racism-and-the-heart-of-god/

LIFE.CHURCH BUILDINGS ARE REOPENING

Some Life.Church locations have resumed services. To ensure safety at our locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. To see if your location is open, please visit https://www.life.church/updates

SUPPORT COVID-19 RESPONSE AND DIGITAL MISSIONS

You can designate a gift to Life.Church to go to coronavirus relief or to Digital Missions like the Church Online Platform! Your gift above the tithe helps meet immediate needs in your community and around the world and helps other churches to spread the Good News of Christ to people everywhere: https://www.life.church/giving

STAY CONNECTED

Stay updated with the latest news from Life.Church at https://www.life.church/stayconnected. You can also visit https://www.life.church/updates for the latest, or download the Life.Church app (https://www.life.church/app) and enable push notifications.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app. 

FIND US ON SOCIAL MEDIA

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/life.church

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/lifechurch

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/craiggroeschel

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/craiggroeschel  

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/craiggroeschel

items.content:
LIFE.CHURCH BUILDINGS REOPENING

Some Life.Church locations have resumed services. To ensure safety at our locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. To see if your location is open and to save your seat at an upcoming service, please visit https://www.life.church/updates

I’M ENCOURAGING

Being an encourager is more than just cheerleading. Let this four-day Stay Positive Bible Plan help you discover the beauty and strength of encouragement. Start reading: https://www.go2.lc/staypositive

SUPPORT COVID-19 RESPONSE AND DIGITAL MISSIONS

You can designate a gift to Life.Church to go to coronavirus relief or to Digital Missions like the Church Online Platform! Your gift above the tithe helps meet immediate needs in your community and around the world and helps other churches to spread the Good News of Christ to people everywhere: https://www.life.church/giving

ABOUT STAY POSITIVE

There’s no limit on hope. You can discover a whole lot to smile about if you know where to look. And we can help you find it! Don’t let life get you down. Stay joyful. Stay hopeful. And Stay Positive! For more about this series, visit https://www.life.church/staypositive

REOPENING
Some Life.Church locations have resumed services. To ensure safety at our locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. To see if your location is open and see updated service times, please visit https://www.life.church/updates
I’M CONFIDENT
So many of us teeter between insecurity and false confidence. This four-day Bible Plan will lay your new foundation in God confidence. Continue the six-part Stay Positive Bible Plan series: https://www.go2.lc/staypositive
SUPPORT COVID-19 RESPONSE AND DIGITAL MISSIONS
You can designate a gift to Life.Church to go to coronavirus relief or to Digital Missions like the Church Online Platform! Your gift above the tithe helps meet immediate needs in your community and around the world and helps other churches to spread the Good News of Christ to people everywhere: https://www.life.church/giving
ABOUT STAY POSITIVE
There’s no limit on hope. You can discover a whole lot to smile about if you know where to look. And we can help you find it! Don’t let life get you down. Stay joyful. Stay hopeful. And Stay Positive! For more about this series, visit https://www.life.church/staypositive
STAY CONNECTED
Stay updated with the latest news from Life.Church at https://www.life.church/stayconnected. You can also visit https://www.life.church/updates for the latest, or download the Life.Church app (https://www.life.church/app) and enable push notifications.
NEXT STEPS
Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next
ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH
Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app. 
FIND US ON SOCIAL MEDIA
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/life.church
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/life.church
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/lifechurch

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIIdiIO-Y20hRW9niR0CA8A
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/craiggroeschel
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/craiggroeschel

itunes.summary: Gratitude is the gateway to peace. Thankfulness brings joy. In this week’s Stay Positive message, find out how to cure complaining by focusing on gratitude and thankfulness for what God has given!

items.content:
REOPENING

Some Life.Church locations have resumed services. To ensure safety at our locations, our weekend services have been redesigned to create a sanitary, touchless environment that allows for physical distancing. To see if your location is open and to save your seat at an upcoming service, please visit https://www.life.church/updates

I’M OPTIMISTIC

Optimism doesn’t depend on what we see—it stems from what God says. This four-day Bible Plan unwraps eight reasons from Romans 8 to remain unwaveringly optimistic. Start reading part one of the six-part Stay Positive series: https://www.go2.lc/staypositive

SUPPORT COVID-19 RESPONSE AND DIGITAL MISSIONS

You can designate a gift to Life.Church to go to coronavirus relief or to Digital Missions like the Church Online Platform!
