itunes.summary: Bad news seems to be everywhere you look these days. What consumes your mind controls your life—so who’s ready for some good news and positive thinking instead? In Week 1 of Stay Positive, join Pastor Craig Groeschel to discover the hope you can have in Christ, the good news you need to hear, and how to stay optimistic even when bad news tries to dominate your daily life.
itunes.author: Craig Groeschel

items.content:
STAY CONNECTED

Even when we can’t meet in our physical locations, we’re still doing church. Stay updated with the latest news from Life.Church at https://www.life.church/stayconnected. You can also visit https://www.life.church/updates for the latest, or download the Life.Church app (https://www.life.church/app) and enable push notifications.

SUPPORT COVID-19 RESPONSE AND DIGITAL MISSIONS

You can designate a gift to Life.Church to go to coronavirus relief or to Digital Missions like the Church Online Platform! Your gift above the tithe helps meet immediate needs in your community and around the world and helps other churches to spread the Good News of Christ to people everywhere: https://www.life.church/giving

 

DO CHURCH AT HOME

Churches in many countries are suspending regular in-person gatherings, but that doesn’t mean church is canceled. As followers of Jesus, we are the Church. Use this guide on having church at home to stay connected to your community: https://finds.life.church/church-at-home-guide/

LIFE.CHURCH MIDWEEK 

Life.Church is hosting special midweek services with worship and a short devotional with Pastor Craig Groeschel here on YouTube Live every Wednesday. Subscribe to our channel and tap the bell icon to be notified when we’re going live!

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

itunes.summary: Your purpose is yours alone. God created you to live out your unique calling. No one else can do it for you. And you can’t live out anyone else’s. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel to see how when you start to compare your calling with someone else’s, you might find yourself disappointed, discouraged, or disillusioned with your life.

itunes.summary: God made you on purpose, for a purpose. There’s a “why” behind your “who.” If you’re ready to find your “why,” join Pastor Craig Groeschel for a powerful message about your purpose, your calling, and how to live out who you were made to be.

itunes.summary: When we’re going through trials, it’s tempting to look at our lives with a perspective of pain. But there’s a purpose in your pain. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel to see how God never wastes a hurt, and how He’s preparing you for something far greater through the trials, struggles, and pain you’re experiencing now.

You can also visit https://www.life.church/updates for the latest, or download the Life.Church app (https://www.life.church/app) and enable push notifications.

SUPPORT COVID-19 RESPONSE AND DIGITAL MISSIONS

You can designate a gift to Life.Church to go to coronavirus relief or to Digital Missions like the Church Online Platform! Your gift above the tithe helps meet immediate needs in your community and around the world and helps other churches to spread the Good News of Christ to people everywhere: https://www.life.church/giving

 

DO CHURCH AT HOME

Churches in many countries are suspending regular in-person gatherings, but that doesn’t mean church is canceled. As followers of Jesus, we are the Church. Use this guide on having church at home to stay connected to your community: https://finds.life.church/church-at-home-guide/

LIFE.CHURCH MIDWEEK 

Life.Church is hosting special midweek services with worship and a short devotional with Pastor Craig Groeschel here on YouTube Live every Wednesday. Subscribe to our channel and tap the bell icon to be notified when we’re going live!

ABOUT NOT AFRAID

When our world is shaken, it’s easy for fear to spread. But God promises to be with us no matter what comes our way. In times of uncertainty, it’s more important than ever to trust who God is and how He says we can live—Not Afraid. More: https://www.life.church/media/messages/not-afraid

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

itunes.summary:
One church. Thousands of locations. Let's gather together in our homes to celebrate life in Christ this Easter. 

As humans, we like to feel like we’re in control. We like to know what we can expect. But right now, we’re uncertain. We’re distant. Right now, life feels out of control. But maybe we never had it in the first place. In this special Easter message, Pastor Craig Groeschel will show you how we gain strength, peace, and courage when we surrender control of our lives to God. It won’t always be easy—but it will always be worth it.
itunes.keywords: easter story, he is risen, easter, matthew 26, in control, surrender control, life is out of control, out of control, illusion of control, easter sermon video, church online, god is in control, craig groeschel easter, easter sermon, resurrection, easter sermon 2020, easter message, easter sunday, crucifixion, easter 2020
itunes.author: Craig Groeschel

itunes.summary: At this unprecedented time, people everywhere are searching for comfort, peace, or anxiety relief. If you’re stressed out, filled with fear, or panicked about what tomorrow may bring—there’s hope. There’s an answer. There’s good news. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel to discover what to do when anxiety attacks.

itunes.summary: It’s OK to feel emotional right now. Anxiety, fear, and isolation might be trying to take over your heart, but God’s Word tells us in James that when we draw near to God, He draws near to us. If you’re feeling anxious, alone, or afraid and need to feel God closer to you, this video is for you. Listen to this hope-filled message from Pastor Craig Groeschel to discover God’s faithfulness, unfailing love, and promises for the future.
itunes.keywords: anxiety
itunes.author: Life.Church: Craig Groeschel

itunes.summary: Hope is contagious. When the fear of the unknown spreads, our hope in Christ can spread even faster. Replace panic with peace. Replace anxiety with comfort. Replace the “what-ifs” with faith in what God can do. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel for a special message to see how, in the face of coronavirus fears and isolation, we can have a contagious hope that fights back the fear of the unknown.
itunes.author: Craig Groeschel

itunes.summary:
In the last two weeks Pastor Craig Groeschel has gained a unique perspective on the fear and anxiety related to the recent coronavirus outbreak. Hear what he's learned from his experience, and how God invites us to respond to the situation.

When our world is shaken, it’s easy for fear to spread. But God promises to be with us no matter what comes our way. In times of uncertainty, it’s more important than ever to trust who God is and how He says we can live—Not Afraid.
itunes.keywords: how to overcome fear, gatherings, sound mind, fear, spirit of fear, coronavirus church, coronavirus response, craig groeschel coronavirus, life.church coronavirus

items.author: interactive@life.church (Robert Morris)
items.title: First Things First, Part 2: The Principles of Multiplication
items.content:
THREE-MONTH TITHE CHALLENGE

Countless people experience God's blessings when they tithe, but often the first step is the hardest one to take. That’s why we created the Three-Month Tithe Challenge. Put God first in your finances for 90 days, and if you don’t experience His faithfulness, we will refund 100% of your tithe. Take the challenge at https://www.life.church/giving/challenge

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: http://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app. 

WELCOME PASTOR ROBERT MORRIS

Robert Morris is the founding lead senior pastor of Gateway Church, a multi-site church in the Dallas/Fort Worth area. Since it began in 2000, the church has grown to more than 71,000 active attenders. His television program is aired in over 190 countries, and his radio program, Worship & the Word with Pastor Robert, airs in more than 1,800 radio markets across America. He serves as chancellor of The King’s University and is the bestselling author of numerous books, including The Blessed Life, Frequency, Beyond Blessed, and Take the Day Off.

 

Robert and his wife, Debbie, have been married 39 years and are blessed with one married daughter, two married sons, and nine grandchildren. For more about Pastor Robert and his ministry, visit https://www.gatewaypeople.com.

itunes.summary: When people think of generosity and tithing, we wonder how far that 10% can go. But sometimes it’s good if things don’t add up. When God is in the equation, we can end up with way more than we expected. Learn what can happen in our lives when we shift our thinking and start to multiply what He’s given us.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Robert Morris)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Robert Morris)
items.title: First Things First, Part 1: The Principle of First
items.content:
THREE-MONTH TITHE CHALLENGE

Countless people experience God's blessings when they tithe, but often the first step is the hardest one to take. That’s why we created the Three-Month Tithe Challenge. Put God first in your finances for 90 days, and if you don’t experience His faithfulness, we will refund 100% of your tithe. Take the challenge at www.life.church/giving/challenge

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: http://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app. 

WELCOME PASTOR ROBERT MORRIS

Robert Morris is the founding lead senior pastor of Gateway Church, a multi-site church in the Dallas/Fort Worth area. Since it began in 2000, the church has grown to more than 71,000 active attenders. His television program is aired in over 190 countries, and his radio program, Worship & the Word with Pastor Robert, airs in more than 1,800 radio markets across America. He serves as chancellor of The King’s University and is the bestselling author of numerous books, including The Blessed Life, Frequency, Beyond Blessed, and Take the Day Off.

 

Robert and his wife, Debbie, have been married 39 years and are blessed with one married daughter, two married sons, and nine grandchildren. For more about Pastor Robert and his ministry, visit 

https://www.gatewaypeople.com

itunes.summary: First Things First is a pretty good way to live … unless you don’t know what that first thing is. If you’ve found yourself focusing more on what matters less, you’re not alone. Join Pastor Robert Morris as we discover how to put what's important on top of our priority lists.

items.title: Dangerous Prayers, Part 3: The Most Dangerous Prayer: Break My Heart
items.content:
JOIN A LIFEGROUP

Find the community you’ve been looking for. Discover the prayer warriors waiting to stand with you. If you’re interested in joining or starting a LifeGroup, visit https://www.life.church/lifegroups.

 

PRAYERS FOR WHAT YOU NEED

Whether you’re new to prayer or have been praying your whole life, it can sometimes feel overwhelming figuring out where to begin. We’ve put together some resources that may help you discover why we pray, how you can pray, and some prayers for strength, hope, stress, and everything else you need. Read through our prayer guide, available here: https://finds.life.church/prayers-for-strength/

 

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

 

PRAY WITH FIRE

Prayer moves the heart of God, but some prayers move Him more than others do. Bold prayers, daring prayers—the kind of prayers that move you, too. If you’re ready to see God work in your life, praying safe won’t cut it. It’s time to pray Dangerous Prayers. Find more from our Dangerous Prayers series here: https://www.life.church/dangerousprayers

 

MORE FROM DANGEROUS PRAYERS

Find even more ways to strengthen your prayer life. You can check out Pastor Craig’s new book, Dangerous Prayers, available here: https://www.amazon.com/Dangerous-Prayers-Because-Following-Jesus/dp/0310343127   

 

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

http://www.twitter.com/craiggroeschel

itunes.summary: The thought of asking God to break your heart might sound a bit dangerous—and that’s because it is. In this message, Pastor Craig Groeschel introduces a prayer meant to align your heart with God’s, so you can begin to live in His truth and righteousness. Find out why asking God to break your heart could change your life forever.

itunes.summary: It’s hard to hear from God when you don’t know what to listen for, especially if you find yourself praying with caution. But He’s ready for you to give Him your boldest prayers, and wants you to understand what He has to say. In this message, join Pastor Craig Groeschel to discover how to clear your mind and prepare your heart so you can be ready to hear from God.

PRAYERS FOR WHAT YOU NEED
Whether you’re new to prayer or have been praying your whole life, it can sometimes feel overwhelming figuring out where to begin. We’ve put together some resources that may help you discover why we pray, how you can pray, and some prayers for strength, hope, stress, and everything else you need. Read through our prayer guide, available here: https://finds.life.church/prayers-for-strength/
NEXT STEPS
Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: http://www.life.church/next
PRAY WITH FIRE
Prayer moves the heart of God, but some prayers move Him more than others do. Bold prayers, daring prayers—the kind of prayers that move you, too. If you’re ready to see God work in your life, praying safe won’t cut it. It’s time to pray Dangerous Prayers. Find more from our Dangerous Prayers series here: www.life.church/dangerousprayers
MORE FROM DANGEROUS PRAYERS
Find even more ways to strengthen your prayer life. You can check out Pastor Craig’s new book, Dangerous Prayers, available here: https://www.amazon.com/Dangerous-Prayers-Because-Following-Jesus/dp/0310343127   
ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH
Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at 
https://www.live.life.church
. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at 
https://www.life.church
 or download the Life.Church app at 
https://www.life.church/app
.

itunes.summary: When you talk to God, are you boldly bringing Him powerful prayers or are you stuck in a rut of praying it safe? In this week's message, Pastor Craig Groeschel brings to light how to break common prayer habits and begin talking to God with confidence and courage. Find out how God empowers you to take hold of the bravery you need to renew your faith and start praying powerful prayers.

items.title: Warrior, Part 4: What Every Warrior Needs to Hear
items.content:
MEN: JOIN OR LEAD A WARRIOR LIFEGROUP

Men: You don’t have to fight your battles alone. Life is better together! LifeGroups are a place to laugh, grow, and serve with friends. If you’re interested in a LifeGroup, head to https://www.life.church/lifegroups to get started.

LET PASTOR CRAIG LEAD YOUR LIFEGROUP

Going through Warrior with your men’s LifeGroup? Pastor Craig has created discussion videos you can use to spark conversation and grow closer together. Find them each week of the series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLXvTERtQ_HV95I1zWGNn02-92iCSQXOo8

WHAT ARE YOU FIGHTING FOR?

Defeat the fear that stares you down. Find purpose in your battles. Discover your God-given courage to become the Warrior He made you to be. Get more from the Warrior message series: https://www.life.church/warrior

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: http://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

itunes.summary: When you wrestle with letting go of the past, leaving behind the pain of rejection seems impossible. We’re all wounded warriors, and often those wounds were given by the people we love. But God wants to give you the freedom you’ve been looking for. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel for this week’s message, and discover how you can finally let go of the past and step into the healing God has for you.

itunes.summary: Sexual sin often leads to shame, guilt, and pain—but you don’t have to give in. It’s time to stand up and fight lust, adultery, and porn. In this message, Pastor Craig Groeschel will help you understand why sexual sin is so easily draws us in, why we can’t allow it to keep its hold on us, and a five-step plan to defeat temptation and overcome the sexual sin that tries to control us.

itunes.summary:
You’re a warrior. You’ve got something to fight for. You have someone to protect. You’ve got a kingdom to advance. You’ve got an enemy to conquer. When it’s time to throw a punch, what does a true warrior do? Join Pastor Craig Groeschel to gain wisdom and understanding from God’s Word as you fight your battles. You’re a warrior—it’s time to step into your calling.

MEN: JOIN OR LEAD A WARRIOR LIFEGROUP
Men: You don’t have to fight your battles alone. Life is better together! LifeGroups are a place to laugh, grow, and serve with friends. If you’re interested in a LifeGroup. Head to https://www.life.church/lifegroups to get started.

LET PASTOR CRAIG LEAD YOUR LIFEGROUP
Going through Warrior with your men’s LifeGroup? Pastor Craig has created discussion videos you can use to spark conversation and grow closer together. Find them each week of the series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLXvTERtQ_HV95I1zWGNn02-92iCSQXOo8

WHAT ARE YOU FIGHTING FOR?
Defeat the fear that stares you down. Find purpose in your battles. Discover your God-given courage to become the Warrior He made you to be. Get more from the Warrior message series: https://www.life.church/warrior

itunes.summary:
When you have big goals, it’s difficult feeling like you can make a difference when you don’t think you have what it takes to reach them. But God has given you the gifts you need to make the dreams He’s given you a reality. Join Pastor Tim Doremus for this week’s message, and find out how when you’ve got God, you really can make a difference.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Craig Groeschel)
items.title: The Gift, Part 3: A King Like No Other
items.content:
Do you know Jesus from a distance, or do you know Jesus as king? He wants you to know Him on a personal level, and just how much His purpose has to do with you. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel in this Christmas message as he discusses a king like no other.

 

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: http://www.life.church/next

 

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app. 

 

ABOUT THE GIFT

We treasure hand-picked gifts from those we love. They’re valuable and important because they’re meant just for us. And one gift meant so much, it forever changed the course of history. The story of this gift is one worth sharing. Find related series, articles, discussion questions, and more: http://www.life.church/thegift

items.title: I Declare War, Part 2: Act Like a Wolf
items.content: The hardest battles we fight can be the ones we wage against ourselves. It's time to take on your inner critic. Say I Declare War to the hidden struggles, negative thoughts, and anxieties that keep you from becoming who God created you to be.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: The Grudge, Part 4: Why Can’t I Forgive Myself?
items.content: The past doesn’t always stay in the past. Sometimes, you carry it with you. But you don’t have to hold on to the bitter memories and painful moments that steal your joy and weigh you down. You have the choice to let go of The Grudge.

items.title: What’s Next?, Part 2: Dream Again
items.content: Have you ever felt like something's missing? Are you longing for a clearer sense of purpose in your life? You were created for significance, not just survival. Together, let's figure out What’s Next?

items.title: I’m In, Part 4: I’m Invested
items.content: You have a God-given purpose waiting to be discovered. You have people around you ready to encourage you. And you may not know it yet, but you have everything you need to chase your passion. We just have one question: Are you in?

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Sam Marin)
items.title: Never Stand Alone, Part 1: Never Stand Alone
items.content: The pain of standing alone is real. The joy of walking together is priceless. The difference is the people in your life. Join us for a special message to see why we can Never Stand Alone—and who's always on your side.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: James Meehan)
items.title: Switch Weekend, Part 1: Questions for God
items.content: It’s okay to wonder about the unknown and wrestle with your unbelief. But you never have to do it alone. This weekend, find the community you crave and the courage to tackle your fears.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: Anxious for Nothing, Part 4: When You Just Can’t Decide
items.content: You weren’t created to exist in a constant state of anxiety. It drains your joy and leaves you stressed, burned out, and exhausted. Your purpose isn’t living in fear. Step boldly into the peace you’ll find when you’re Anxious for Nothing.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Pierre du Plessis)
items.title: The Power of a Shadow, Part 1: The Power of a Shadow
items.content: Influence is powerful. It shapes our lives and moves others to action. It's the shadow we cast and the shadow we live under. So—who’s influencing you? Let's answer that question and discover The Power of a Shadow together.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: The Good Work, Part 4: Shut the Door on Distractions
items.content: Making a difference might start with a different perspective. You might not be able to change the whole world, but you can change your part. What’s your purpose? What’s your story? What’s The Good Work God will do through you?

items.content: What really makes for a happy life? A dream job, a bigger house, or a new relationship? If you’re always hungry for the next big thing, but frustrated because it never seems to satisfy, it’s time to hop off the treadmill and chase after something ...

items.title: Face the Giant, Part 2: Facing Your Giants
items.content: Whether you’re staring down anxiety, pain, guilt, failure, or anything else that feels too big to battle on your own, you can find the courage to Face the Giant in your own life.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Jon Chasteen)
items.title: Watch Where You Sit, Part 1: Watch Where You Sit
items.content: In your relationships, your family, and even in your heart, where you sit might matter more than you realize. If you want to land in the right spots, you’re going to need to Watch Where You Sit.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Sam Roberts)
items.title: Blind Bartimaeus, Part 1: Blind Bartimaeus
items.content: “I want to see.” These words—and the faith to speak them—changed one man’s life forever. Learning to trust God can make the same change in you. Maybe all you need to do is ask.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: Habits, Part 3: Stopping
items.content: Change isn’t easy, but it isn’t impossible, either. Your future self is a result of the decisions you make each day. Starting a few small Habits can change how you see yourself today and transform you into the person you want to be tomorrow.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Tim Doremus)
items.title: Travel Light, Part 5: Letting Go of Your Past
items.content: When the weight of the world is on your shoulders, it can feel like you’re going nowhere in a hurry. Shake off the burdens of stress, worry, and regret and find the freedom that comes when you Travel Light.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: One Minute After You Die, Part 3: The Glory of Heaven
items.content: The questions you have about life after death—Is there a heaven? Am I good enough? What if I’m not?—can leave you wondering, but they don’t mean you have to live in fear. Bring your questions and find out what happens One Minute After You Die.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Christine Caine)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Christine Caine)
items.title: Unashamed, Part 1: Unashamed
items.content: You know the feeling. The one you get when you think you’re not good enough. The one that convinces you you’ve done something too awful to forgive. That’s shame holding you back. And it’s time to break free and start living Unashamed.
items.contentSnippet: You know the feeling. The one you get when you think you’re not good enough. The one that convinces you you’ve done something too awful to forgive. That’s shame holding you back. And it’s time to break free and start living Unashamed.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Steven Furtick)
items.title: Not a Hostage, Part 1: Not a Hostage
items.content: We’re all bound to find ourselves in difficult situations, but we don’t have to be bound to them. You’re Not a Hostage to fear, pain, and doubt when you have hope, peace, and love in your corner.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: Hope in the Dark, Part 3: Embracing God in the Valley
items.content: When life hits hard, it plunges us into a sea of questions we hoped we’d never have to ask. But when you feel broken, abandoned, and struggling to find answers, there’s a beacon in the storm. A comfort in your pain. A Hope in the Dark.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: Relational Vampires, Part 4: Hypocritical People
items.content: They drain your joy, eat up your time, and rain on your parade, but there’s a better way to deal with Relational Vampires than stakes, garlic, and pitchforks. Let’s learn how to love the people who suck the life out of us.

items.title: When Pigs Fly, Part 4: Miracles of Provision
items.content: Chalk it up to coincidence or luck if you want, but we think there’s something bigger going on when the impossible happens. Are you searching for hope? Are you waiting for a miracle in your life? Today might just be the day When Pigs Fly.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Jentezen Franklin)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Jentezen Franklin)
items.title: Love Like You’ve Never Been Hurt, Part 1: Love Like You’ve Never Been Hurt
items.content: The people we love the most can wound us the deepest. We hold onto grudges, refuse to forgive, and build up walls to keep the pain away. But healing can’t start until you break down those barriers and learn to Love Like You’ve Never Been Hurt.
items.contentSnippet: The people we love the most can wound us the deepest. We hold onto grudges, refuse to forgive, and build up walls to keep the pain away. But healing can’t start until you break down those barriers and learn to Love Like You’ve Never Been Hurt.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Chris Beall)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Chris Beall)
items.title: Exponential, Part 3: Exponential Reward
items.content: When you make a choice, its effects ripple further than you can see. When you plant a seed and nourish it, it can grow beyond your wildest expectations. And when you add to the work God is doing, He can multiply it into something Exponential.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Tim Doremus)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Tim Doremus)
items.title: What Would Jesus Undo?, Part 4: Spiritual Pride
items.content: We tie ourselves in knots going through the motions to meet the world’s expectations. But you weren’t created for that. Whether you’re struggling to find a new start or looking for a place to grow, it’s time to get real about who you’re meant to be.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: Selfless, Part 4: Grateful in the Grind
items.content: When you serve more, you take less. When you give more, you need less. When you thank more, you want less. When there’s more of God, you’re Selfless.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Tome Dawson)
items.title: Hope in Action, Part 1: Hope in Action
items.content: Hope will point you in the right direction, but there’s only one way to reach your goal. Let’s learn what happens when we combine our dreams with dedication. Join us for a new message, Hope in Action!

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: God With Us, Part 4: Always
items.content: He’s with you through the pain. He comforts you in the waiting. When you’re anxious about your future, He gives you courage. As you climb the mountain, He keeps you safe in His arms. In every moment, we have God With Us.

items.title: Blood and Thunder, Part 2: Ride the Lightning
items.content: What does it take to see a move of God? Let's see what's possible when we add our sweat, tears, and blood to the power from above. Join us for Blood and Thunder at Life.Church!

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Tim Doremus)
items.title: Overwhelmed, Part 1: Overwhelmed
items.content: So much to do, and so little time to do it ... sound familiar? When you're spread thin, it's easy to feel defeated—but you don't have to be Overwhelmed. Let's look at how we can bring some strength and sanity to our daily lives.

items.title: True Worshipers, Part 1: True Worshipers
items.content: We all worship something. A job, team, celebrity, a number in a bank account—what’s truly worthy of your devotion? Join us as we learn what it means to be True Worshipers.

items.title: The Vow, Part 4: The Vow of Purity
items.content: Wedding vows are more than a declaration of love—they hold the keys to a strong, lasting marriage. Whether you hope to get married someday or you’ve already tied the knot, discover what The Vow can mean for the future.

items.title: Overcomer, Part 4: Overcoming the Face of Fear
items.content: Stare down your fears, shatter your insecurities, and shake off the apathy that tries to hold you back. You’re not a prisoner—you’re an Overcomer.

items.content: Stare down your fears, shatter your insecurities, and shake off the apathy that tries to hold you back. You’re not a prisoner—you’re an Overcomer.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Sam Roberts)
items.title: Playlist, Part 3: Something Just Like This
items.content: Your life has a soundtrack. Every peak, every low note, and every rhythm make up a part of who you are. Don’t just shuffle through your days—create a Playlist worth listening to.

items.title: This Is What We Do, Part 3: Abundant Givers

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Levi Lusko)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Levi Lusko)
items.title: Through the Eyes of a Lion, Part 2: Through the Eyes of a Lion
items.content: The darkness you might feel looming over your life won’t last forever. Heartbreaks heal. Suffering is temporary. Let’s welcome the light and gain a new perspective on our pain—let’s see it Through the Eyes of a Lion.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: Divine Direction, Part 4: Faith to Start
items.content: You haven’t finished your life story. What will you do with the blank pages? The choices you make today will lead you one way or another—but when you know who to trust, you'll always be headed in the Divine Direction.

items.title: I Want to Believe, But..., Part 4: Heartless God
items.content: It’s often difficult to believe in a God we cannot see. We wonder why God didn’t answer our prayers, why God allows suffering, or why we can’t feel His presence. God may not meet all your expectations—but that’s good news! Find out why in a new se...

items.title: Words to Live By, Part 1: Words to Live By
items.content: Your thoughts can hold you back, push you down, and feed you lies. But they can also lift you up! Is it time for you to change the way you’re thinking? Start with something simple—let’s find some Words to Live By.

items.title: Ghosts of Christmas Past, Part 3: Labels
items.content: For many, the most wonderful time of the year isn't so wonderful. A painful past or our own insecurities can overshadow the joy we're supposed to be feeling. What if this year could look different? It’s time to let God heal the Ghosts of Christmas...

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Rich Wilkerson Jr.)
items.title: Church Is ..., Part 1: Church Is ...
items.content: The word “church” holds different meanings, depending on who you ask. And if you ask us, a church isn’t a building. It’s people. Want to know more? Let’s talk this weekend about what Church Is—and what church could be.

items.title: Making Change, Part 4: Tomorrow Matters

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: I Choose, Part 4: Important Over Urgent
items.content: We are the result of our decisions. While we agonize over little things like what to wear and what to eat, are we glossing over the big choices? There might be more on the line than you thought when you say “I Choose.”

items.title: Bad Advice, Part 4: How to Be Dissatisfied
items.content: “How did I end up here?” Behind every mess of harmful habits and rough relationships, we can look back and see where we got on the wrong track. Let’s untangle our lives by learning how to avoid Bad Advice.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Joyce Meyer)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Joyce Meyer)
items.title: The Right Heart, Part 2: Love, Love, and Then Love Some More
items.content: Love God, love people—sounds simple enough. So why is it so hard to live out? Maybe it’s because we're going about it all wrong. Join special guest Joyce Meyer to see why love isn’t about following the right rules—it’s about having The Right Heart.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Chris Beall)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Chris Beall)
items.title: How to Neighbor, Part 4: Loving The Lonely
items.content: As the world grows more connected, our neighbors are closer than ever. But how close are we to our neighbors? You might not share a fence, but you can still share their burdens and joys. Now’s the time to show the world How to Neighbor.

items.creator: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: Love Like Jesus, Part 3: Breaks Bread
items.content: There’s so much pain and hurt in the world, sometimes it's hard to see anything else. But what if, when we looked around, all we saw was love? The greatest sacrifice in history shows us how to make it happen. Let’s learn to Love Like Jesus.

items.title: Easter 2016, Part 1: Consider Jesus
items.content: The deepest love poured out of the greatest sacrifice in history. A love that heals. A love that forgives. A love that welcomes. Join us this Easter as we celebrate the power of Christ’s resurrection.

items.title: Going the Distance, Part 2: No Words Needed

items.title: Twisted, Part 4: The Root of All Evil
items.content: The Bible is full of wisdom. People love to quote their favorite verses to encourage and inspire each other—but sometimes, those verses get taken out of context. What happens when the most important message of all gets Twisted?

items.title: Dangerous Prayers, Part 3: Send Me
items.content: Believe your big risks will be rewarded. Believe what you ask for is possible. If you’re ready to see a spark in your life, pray boldly. Pray daringly. Pray with fire. And remember God's listening to your Dangerous Prayers.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Sam Roberts)
items.title: Get Started, Part 1: Get Started
items.content: New year, same problems. Sound familiar? Maybe it’s because you’re waiting for something. The world to change. The right time. A green light. Here’s the good news: the wait is over. Your future is wide open—it’s time to Get Started.

items.title: Christmas 2015, Part 1: Christmas 2015
items.content:
Around the world, Christmas sounds fill the air,
Stockings are hung, lists written with care.
We buy and we bake, we gift and receive,
We decorate houses, cities, and trees.
Christmas: it’s different, everywhere you go,
But it began with...

items.title: When God Doesn’t Make Sense, Part 3: When God Seems Uncooperative
items.content: Life doesn’t always go the way we expected. You pray with faith, but God doesn’t do what you asked. You seek Him, but don’t feel His presence. You’re going through pain, but your cries for relief seem to go unanswered. What do you do When God Does...

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: The Time Is Now, Part 3: The Blessings of Obedience
items.content: No matter how much we want one, there’s no blueprint for a perfect life. Feel like you’ve hit a wall? Don’t be discouraged. Maybe it’s just a part of what God wants to help you rebuild. The Time Is Now to lay the first brick on a new foundation.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: #Struggles, Part 1: #Struggles
items.content: When our self worth is measured in hearts, likes, and comments, we’ll never be enough. We’re living to be liked, but longing to be loved. Let’s learn to find our meaning beyond the #Struggles of our selfie-centered world.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Louie Giglio)
items.title: Man in the Mirror, Part 2: Embracing God’s Love
items.content: You were never meant to be perfect. You were created to be loved. So why is it so hard to love ourselves? It's not a simple answer. Maybe it's time to take a look at your relationship with the Man in the Mirror.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Sam Roberts)
items.title: Pray, Part 4: How Do I Know What’s Best?
items.content: Prayers aren't empty words hurled at the sky. They’re conversations—in fact, they're the most important conversations of our lives. Find out just how much it matters when you Pray.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: I Deserve It, Part 4: I Deserve To Be Counted Out, But He Gave Me Another Chance
items.content: How different would the world look if everyone got what they deserved? Would your salary be the same? What would our prisons look like? Would nice guys finish first or last? God knows what we deserve. See if that's what we get in I Deserve It.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Steven Furtick)
items.title: Don’t Stop, Part 2: It Will Happen
items.content: The finish line. The goal. What are you working toward? Obstacles and trials will come and go, but one thing can always remain constant on your journey. Keep your eyes on the prize because good things happen when you Don’t Stop.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Pierre du Plessis)
items.title: Chasing Light, Part 2: Greed
items.content: Light brings clarity. It’s the catalyst for growth. It helps us find our way. Life simply can’t happen without light—and there’s nowhere it shines brighter than at its source. Get a better glimpse in Chasing Light.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: God Never Said That, Part 4: It Doesn’t Matter What You Believe
items.content: We love offering little nuggets of advice, support, or sympathy. They come in handy when we want people to feel better. But what if the guidance you’re giving or receiving just isn’t true? What if God Never Said That?

items.title: Jesus and We, Part 4: Anything Short of Sin
items.content: Seven billion people occupy this tiny slice of history. And it's not by accident. God chose our generation to make a difference–but He doesn’t want us to do it alone. Find out how in Jesus and We.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Chris Beall)
items.title: First Things First, Part 1: First Things First
items.content: The most important thing doesn’t always get the first priority – but it should. What will it take to stop being distracted by the urgent and start focusing on the meaningful? Today, let’s decide to put First Things First.

items.title: Come to Worship, Part 4: Bow Your Knees

items.title: Struggles, Part 5: Rest
items.content: As you scroll through your day, does it feel like everyone else has it all together? Someone always has the best job, cutest kid, or happiest relationship. We're pressured to measure up to other people's status updates and left with more #struggles.

items.title: Small Things Big Difference, Part 4: Your Habits
items.content: Major resolutions and huge goals. We want big change and we want it now. But maybe taking life in a new direction has a lot more to do with the little things. Let's learn how to embrace intentionality in Small Things, Big Difference.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Christine Caine)
items.title: Maker of Miracles, Part 1: Christine Caine - Maker of Miracles
items.content: No one knows more about something than its creator. We see this with mothers and children, architects and buildings, and painters and their art. But is it true for miracles too? Let’s discover what we can learn from the Maker of Miracles.

items.title: Fear Not, Part 3: Fear of Where You Stand with God
items.content: What are you afraid of? Fears attack the most precious parts of our lives and keep us from living the life meant for us. God wants to help us overcome our darkest fears as we learn to Fear Not.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Chris Beall)
items.title: Necessary Sins, Part 4: Anger
items.content: What do you do to get through the day? We allow certain habits to help us deal with life, but sometimes the bad ones can become part of our identity in dangerous ways. It’s time to separate ourselves from our so-called Necessary Sins.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: Fight, Part 1: Fight
items.content: What would you do if someone threatened your marriage, your family, and the state of your heart? Every day, the things we love most are being attacked and we don’t recognize it. It’s time take a stand–it’s time to Fight.

items.title: Multiply 2013, Part 3: Sowing and Reaping
items.content: Sometimes it’s good if things don’t add up. When God is in the equation, we can end up with way more than we expected. Learn what can happen in our lives when we shift our thinking and start to Multiply.

items.title: Elisha A Tale of Ridiculous Faith, Part 4: Ridiculous Recovery
items.content: Let’s stop holding back. It’s time we start taking risks and making decisions the world doesn’t understand. Come see what life can look like when we let go … when we decide to have Ridiculous Faith.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Bobby Gruenewald)
items.title: Just Getting Started, Part 1: Just Getting Started
items.content: It’s no accident that we were created for this time and place in history. God wants to do big things through us in the here and now. Let’s learn about the specific part we get to play, because God’s Just Getting Started.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: Bless This Home, Part 4: Persecuted
items.content: We want our family to enjoy peace, happiness, and contentment, but so often we stumble through our most important relationships. Let's discover four family-altering qualities as we ask God to Bless This Home.

items.title: New, Part 3: New From Old
items.content: Transformation is in our DNA. We were created to grow, and the best kind of change leaves a permanent mark on our soul. Let’s learn together what it means to become New.

items.title: Altar Ego, Part 4: My Longing For Approval
items.content: We are not our labels. We are not who others say we are. And we aren’t the broken self-image we see in the mirror. So how can we get to our true identity? By laying down who we think we are to become who God says we are. Let’s discover our Altar ...

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Ken Blanchard)
items.title: Lead Like Jesus, Part 1: Lead Like Jesus
items.content: Jesus came not to build a religion but to build relationships. And in His time among us, he showed us what true leadership looks like. Join us for a special message from Ken Blanchard as we learn to Lead Like Jesus.

items.title: The End, Part 3: Snapshots of Revelation
items.content: Life as we know it won't last forever. So what happens when this world ceases to exist? And does it matter in the here and now? Let's look to the Bible for answers as we explore The End.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Sam Roberts)
items.title: Love and Hate, Part 2: Overcoming Distance
items.content: God loves every person on this planet. But He doesn’t love everything we do. So where exactly is that line and how should it shape our lives? Join us as we explore Love and Hate.

items.title: From This Day Forward, Part 5: Never Give Up
items.content: Tired of watching marriages crumble? Fed up with couples giving up? Would you like to guarantee that your marriage will last? Join the fight against destruction and make five commitments to fail-proof your marriage, From This Day Forward.

items.title: Perspective, Part 4: A Different Perspective On Worry
items.content: Is happiness dependent on whatever life throws our way or do we have a say in the matter? We can find peace amongst chaos, contentment despite limitations, and joy even in our lowest moments. It all comes down to Perspective.

items.title: Found Favor, Part 2: Walking in the Fog
items.content: Some people have all the luck. Ever look at those people and wonder how they lead such a charmed life? Is it just God playing favorites? Maybe there's more going on than meets the eye. Let’s explore what’s happening when things go our way—and when...

items.title: Samson, Part 4: Failing Forward
items.content: Think you’re strong? Even our best intentions can falter when we face temptation and distraction. Join us as we learn through Samson’s life how to stand strong against forces of darkness that want to take us out.

items.title: Better, Part 4: Better is a Good Name

items.title: John Maxwell, Part 1: Problem or a Miracle

items.title: Carols, Part 4: Emmanuel

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Dave Ramsey)
items.title: Weird, Part 5: A Weird View of Money
items.content: These days, it’s normal to deal with financial debt, high divorce rates, and bad relationships. Maybe it’s time to shake things up. Join us as we explore life beyond normal in our next series, Weird.

items.title: Margin, Part 4: Moral Margin
items.content: Sometimes it seems like the only way to keep up with all the demands on our lives is to run at maximum capacity—and then some. But there is another way ... one where we have room to breathe and space to respond to what life brings our way. Come ex...

items.title: The One Thing, Part 1: New Year’s 2010
items.content: When we’re setting goals for the new year, it’s tempting to tackle everything we want to change about our lives. But how often does that really work? Instead, what if we focused on less to accomplish more? Join us as we explore the power of One Th...

items.title: This Christmas, Part 1: This Christmas
items.content: Have you been spending this Christmas waiting for God to show up? He's here. Maybe you just haven’t been searching for Him.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: Ghost, Part 4: Filled With The Spirit
items.content: The Spirit of life. The essence of truth. The voice of God. He has always been here and will always remain. When you are alone, lost, and afraid, He will carry you home. Come explore the power and comfort of the one who resides within: The Ghost.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Life.Church: Craig Groeschel)
items.title: Elijah, Part 4: Depression
items.content: An angry king. Devastating drought. Epic opposition. And one man who overcomes it all. When the world around us is spinning out of control, where do we turn? Join us as we learn from Elijah.
